attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: To my fellow Trump supporters, while we should fully support him in all things, do not waste your time! Honestly it was such a hassle to even download! Took way too long for a simple app. As well as the construction of the app was so confusing I could hardly navigate it! Thankfully I did and signed up for his rally which I willnâ€™t be attending!! However when I would try to sign up for it, it kept telling me errors and that I was not allowed to? Perhaps because of my Hispanic name, next time I shall try John Smith! Point being, it was very slow and a waste of time

attributes.title: DO NOT EVEN BOTHER GETTING THIS APP
attributes.review: Are you really gonna waste your storage on this app? Anyways I really hope you enjoy your extra storage that you have because you didnâ€™t get this appğŸ˜›

attributes.title: FELLOW TRUMPIES, DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Terrible app when I downloaded the app it gave my phone 69 viruses and when I informed app support they told me my mother is a fat cow and I shouldâ€™ve been aborted which was extremely offensive considering Iâ€™m pro life I do not recommend downloading I was very dissatisfied ğŸ˜¾

I said no then I think that they blocked meğŸ˜­ (I said no but I wanted to go. I want a divorce with Bill) bill was mad so we left. Do not get this appğŸ¥¶

attributes.title: Worst Experience of My Millennial Life
attributes.review: There really should be an option for less than zero stars. So ugly. Trash. Probably the worst digital experience of my life. Deleted.

I deleted it as fast as I could! I would recommend NOBODY to download this! It causes deep trauma!

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: This app froze all the time. I had to turn my phone off every 15 minutes because it caused my phone to freeze. ğŸ¤¦‍â™€ï¸

attributes.title: Awful appâ€”gave me a virus and then called it a hoax
attributes.review: Nothing on this app worked. It gave me a virus on my phone and when I wanted to fix it, the app told me it was a hoax and against its second amendment rights to do anything about the virus. Also spreading fake news: It told me there was going to be a rally and then I went and the place was nearly empty idk what happened. Do not download completely unhelpful.
